thread.title: Health Canada warns of heart risks linked to some bone health products
thread.title_full: Health Canada warns of heart risks linked to some bone health products

title: Health Canada warns of heart risks linked to some bone health products
text:
Health Canada warns of heart risks linked to some bone health products 
CBC News Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Health Canada has asked companies to strengthen their labels on natural health products containing strontium to warn of an increased risk of heart-related side-effects. 
The department said Thursday the label changes are for strontium-containing products with a daily dose between 4 mg and 682 mg, which are used to help support bone mineral density. 
...
